title: Video: Kodak To Graph – Glaciaa
body:
Having just finished a dream tour with Braids and Hundred Waters, Gainesville’s beat-maestro **Kodak To Graph** has compiled this rather gorgeous footage from the road, featuring new track _Glaciaa_.

Taking in expansive, mountainous scenery and racing through picturesque, roadside shops, all against the backdrop of Mikey Maleki’s intricately beautiful compositions. Check out the video below, and grab a free download from [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/kodaktograph/glaciaa/s-W2Ipe).
